parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma1

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Environment

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> local

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Enable/disable environmental effects: ambient life and/or ambient sound.

<template lineStart="1"><title>Feature </title><part><name index="1"/><value> Informative </value></part><part><name index="2"/><value> This command has to be executed after mission start: be sure to use e.g <template><title>ic</title><part><name index="1"/><value>[[waitUntil]] { [[time]] > 0 }<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext></value></part></template> or [[sleep]] for it to take effect.</value></part></template>

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[enableEnvironment]] enabled

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> enabled: [[Boolean]] - ambient life and ambient sounds setting

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>s2</name>=<value> [[enableEnvironment]] [ambientLife, ambientSound] <template><title>Since</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.67</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value>y</value></part></template>

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value> ambientLife: [[Boolean]] - ambient life setting (bees, rabbits, birds, snakes, fish)

</value></part><part><name>p22</name>=<value> ambientSound: [[Boolean]] - ambient sounds setting (cicadas, owls, etc)

</value></part><part><name>r2</name>=<value> [[Nothing]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[enableEnvironment]] [[false]]; <template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>identical to [[enableEnvironment]] [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[[false]], [[false]]]</value></part></template></code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>[[enableEnvironment]] [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[[false]], [[true]]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[environmentEnabled]], [[fadeEnvironment]], [[environmentVolume]], [[initAmbientLife]], [[sideAmbientLife]], [[getAllEnvSoundControllers]], [[getEnvSoundController]], [[setSoundEffect]], [[Arma 3 Animals: Ambient System]]
</value></part></template>


<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma2</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>tkoh</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template></root>
